Title: Balkan Is Not Dead
Writer: Dejan Dukovski (play), Ana Lasic, Aleksandar Popovski
Actors: Nikola Ristanovski, Dragana Kostadinovska, Natasa Tapuskovic, Jordan Simonov
Plot: A Macedonian family from Bitola at the turn of the twentieth century tries to survive, preserve its roots and remain together.
